subject: Basketball (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Red Storm played gritty enough defense, but without its leading scorer, it could not get enough baskets to hang tight with Villanova for a full 40 minutes.
snippet: The Red Storm played gritty enough defense, but without its leading scorer, it could not get enough baskets to hang tight with Villanova for a full 40 minutes.
